divs: Sighting DetailsThis is the second time ive witness this phenomena... the same thing i saw the first time just a different angle looking up in the sky at orions belt i saw 2 large lights side by side then lower to the left i saw five lights, light up one by one in a line then disappear all at once . . and the lights appeared as so only in one straight line: . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . and then it dissapeared and it was light it never existed.. I would be happy to know that it was our military throwing flares but, also disappointed knowing that they would throw flares over a bunch of pine trees after a 4 month drought...
Summary: The 2nd time i've seen this exact phenomena
